quality_assessment: Page provides comprehensive examples with accurate source references. Examples align well with implementation. Minor improvements needed for consistency with actual API structures and visual enhancements.

issues.description: The WorkflowTemplate structure in examples shows simplified syntax that differs from actual API. WorkflowTemplate struct has separate 'name' and 'source' fields, but examples only show 'source' at template level.
issues.fix_suggestion: Clarify that the template syntax shown is a simplified shorthand. Add a note explaining the full WorkflowTemplate structure has both 'name' and 'source' fields.

issues.section: Example 4: Complex Composition with Multiple Features
issues.description: Example shows variable interpolation in sub-workflow source paths (e.g., workflows/${language}/lint.yml), but the validation code (registry.rs:199-208) treats these as non-existent paths unless they start with '${'. This is a known limitation that should be documented.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a note explaining that variable interpolation in sub-workflow source paths requires the paths to exist at composition time, or starts with '${' to skip validation.

issues.description: Page lacks MkDocs Material visual enhancements that would improve readability and user experience for examples.
issues.fix_suggestion: Add visual features: admonition boxes for prerequisites/notes, tabs for comparing similar examples, mermaid diagram showing composition flow, code annotations for complex YAML examples.

positive_aspects: Accurate source references with line numbers throughout (e.g., src/cook/workflow/composition/mod.rs:75-129)
Examples correctly show that workflows use HashMap not array (line 49 reference is accurate)
Good variety of practical examples covering templates, imports, extends, and sub-workflows
Progressive complexity from simple to advanced examples
Clear running instructions section at the end
Proper coverage of template registry pattern with storage locations
improvement_suggestions: Add an overview diagram showing how the examples relate to each other
Include a 'Prerequisites' admonition at the top explaining what features are fully implemented vs planned
Add tabbed examples showing alternative approaches where applicable
Include expected output examples for the running commands
Add cross-references to the index.md implementation roadmap for feature availability

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
